abstrac: I work to understand your vision,guide your path, and prepare you to lead the way.
bio:
I was first interested in technology and computers in late high school. I fell headlong into the open source movement, and appreciated the abundance mindset that open source entails. As that was my first taste of technology I assumed that was the majority of how people did business.

Unfortunately as I've advanced in my career, the voices of software freedom are few. Which is a shame, because so many business have thrived because of open source tools and technology.

Damn Good Technology is here to change the status quo. Because you deserve to manage your own technology. Whether you're an early-stage startup or well-established corporation my goal is to make you feel empowered and capable of competing in today's technology driven market.

I do this through thoughtful, personal conversation; creative experienced design; and ethical, considerate implementation.

Send me an email today so we can start a conversation.

abstrac: Expert in Ruby on Rails, PHP, Laravel, CodeIgniter, WordPress, Magento, AngularJS, Ionic, Android, iOS, NodeJS, ReactJS, Android application
bio:
As an Avant-garde web developer, I always focus on something new and exciting, which stands ahead of the time, as I believe that one needs to be different to be irreplaceable.

Over the last 8+ years, I have developed a wide range of Mobile and Web applications including the following technologies:

- PHP, WordPress, Laravel, CodeIgniter, Magento
- 5+ years of extensive experience in Ruby on Rails
- Ionic, AngularJS, React.js, Node.js
- Android and iOS mobile applications development
- MySQL ,PostgreSQL, MongoDB, SQLite3
- Git, Github, Bitbucket.
- Payment gateways integration
- Experience in Heroku server
- HTML/CSS,JavaScript, jQuery, Ajax, Twitter Bootstrap frameworks
- Creating web applications, Restful Token secure API, multi-tenancy, real-time chat application.
- Theme and Plugin development
- Cross-browser compatibility
- PSD to HTML, responsive design

With passion and strong educational background, I have learned to follow the international standards for quality assurance and ensure both- fast turn-around and high quality. I am aiming at building the highest quality apps, more competitive than others in the market and I offer the most cost-effective solution for this.

Should you find my skills to be useful, please connect with me to discuss further. I will be more than happy to assist with your project.

Given the project, I can assure that my services will be beneficial in more ways than one. I expectantly look forward to speaking with you.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

- For a fixed cost project, we will do milestone wise.
- Daily 8 Hours work
- On critical issues, support 24*7
- Directly communicate with end developer
- Daily updates
- Milestone meetings
- Payment prefers milestone wise in Fixed cost projects

bio:
My name is Jing and I'm a passionate, experienced, entrepreneurial, hands-on professional with 10+ years of experience as a full-stack developer so that looking to cooperate with clients and companies to build strong and long relationships that can both grow each other. I always like to make suggestions that will help the project move as efficiently as possible, because I want my clients to become 100% satisfied with the end result and the time it took to get there.

I'm a fast learner, keeping up to date as new tools emerge in the rapidly evolving programming. I'm a hard worker so that with 10+ years of experience developing websites and web applications for companies in a wide range of programming,

I have the ability to see projects through to completion and propose creative solutions that match customer needs. I love solving problems and tackling new issues, always striving to find the most efficient solutions.

Talking about technical skills, I primarily work with the following development stack:

✅Backend skills:
- Node.js (ES6+, Express.js, Koa.js, Adonis.js, Hapi.js)
- ASP.NET Core web API (C#, Entity Framework Core, .NET Core, IIS)
- Spring Boot web API (Kotlin)
- Golang
- Python (Django, Flask)
- Socket.IO
- Mongoose, Sequelize.js
- PHP (Laravel, Codeigniter)
- AWS Lamda, Firebase funtions, Azure funtions

✅Frontend skills:
- React.js, React Hooks, Context API, React-Redux, Redux-Saga
- Angular 2+, TypeScript, RxJS
- Vue, Jquery
- Strong HTML, CSS, SCSS, LESS
- BootStrap, Material UI, DevExpress UI, and other 3rd Party UI components.

✅Database skills:
- Relational: MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server
- NoSQL: MongoDB, Redis, firestore

✅DevOps skills:
- Unit Testing: Jest, Jasmine
- Source Control & CI/CD: Git, GitHub/GitLab/BitBucket, Kubernetes, Docker, CircleCI, Travis CI
- Deployment: AWS, GCP, Heroku, Digital Ocean

Always welcome to work with professionals and grow together all over the world!

Work hours and day
Every day 12 hours from Monday to Friday.
Weekends if required.

Communication
Phone, Skype, Email, etc.

Prefer hourly ($30~$50) but that doesn't mean excludes fixed-job.

I can work at any timezone as a full-time freelancer and mostly used Skype and Slack for team communication.

bio: Hi! I’m an 18 years old manga artist from Italy. I just got out of high school, and I’m about to start the European Manga school on November, where I’ve also done summer courses about drawing manga. In high school I went to art school, and there I studied the bases of drawing, colouring and anatomy.I both like to draw manga pages traditionally or digitally, and I also do digital illustrations. I usually use Procreate for the digital illustrations, and Clip Studio Paint EX for the manga pages. Since I haven’t started school yet, I have a lot of free time and don’t have a problem with deadlines.

abstrac: 100% commitment to work, deliver best service and bring smiles all over
bio:
I am a SharePoint Expert, Power Platform Developer and Microsoft 365 Professional with over all 12 years of experience having worked with several clients all over the world. My services are best and not limited to below.

- Creating Power Apps Canvas Apps to solve your business requirement.
- Integrating your Power Apps with several data sources including but not limited to SharePoint, SQL Server and Common Data Service (CDS).
- I can integrate your SharePoint lists and Power Apps with Power Automate flows while connecting to several other data sources and updating the dynamic properties of your data sources.
- I can customize your SharePoint list forms using Power Apps.
- I have expertise in converting your business forms to PDFs dynamically using Power Apps and Power Automate.
- I can develop your Power Automate flows solving business needs, creating sequential and parallel approval flows while capturing all dynamic data for historical references.
- I can convert your SharePoint 2010/2013 workflows to Power Automate Flows.
- I can train and teach your SharePoint On-premises, Online, Power Apps and Power Automate.

******Please message me with your requirements. Always glad to assist you******
I can commit for 15hrs work per week. Please restrict our communication within guru.com.

abstrac: Supply Chain Professional, Business Intelligence Developer, Expert Data Analyst, Excel Professional
bio:
I am a senior supply chain analyst with 10 years experience in the manufacturing industry. I have successfully lead many supply chain projects with a focus on ERP, MRP & data analytics. I have built up my business intelligence skills in order to effectively build these supply chain models. My models have turned businesses around and provided deep insight into supply chains. I have experience in supply, demand, forecasting & many other areas across the supply chain. 

I am a Microsoft Excel expert with over 10 years experience using Excel as my tool for advanced data analytics in manufacturing environments. 

I can provide statistical analysis, create macros, create pivot tables, VLOOKUP, merge files, remove duplicates, clean data, & much more utilizing Excel's functions & data tools.

My past projects include statistical analysis on material usage, automating supply chain data including inventory & open orders, price merge files for inventory upload, Amazon/eBay CSV file data cleanup, customer data merge files including addresses & phone numbers.
Typically my projects are bid by the hour.
